options.content: How much SCinet traffic is on the Energy Sciences Network (ESnet)?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  device.location_name as src_node,
  remote_device.location_name AS dst_node,
  sum(bit_count)/($__toTime - $__fromTime) AS out_rate
FROM
  data_flow AS flow
  INNER JOIN meta_device AS device ON device.ref = flow.device_ref
  INNER JOIN meta_interface AS iface ON flow.out_interface_ref = iface.ref
  INNER JOIN meta_interface AS remote_iface ON remote_iface.ref = iface.remote_interface_ref
  INNER JOIN meta_device AS remote_device ON remote_device.ref = remote_iface.device_ref
WHERE
  src_as_id IN (401015, 14031) OR dst_as_id IN (401015, 14031)
GROUP BY src_node, dst_node

SELECT
  device.location_name as src_node,
  remote_device.location_name AS dst_node,
  sum(bit_count)/($__toTime - $__fromTime) AS in_rate
FROM
  data_flow AS flow
  INNER JOIN meta_device AS device ON device.ref = flow.device_ref
  INNER JOIN meta_interface AS iface ON flow.in_interface_ref = iface.ref
  INNER JOIN meta_interface AS remote_iface ON remote_iface.ref = iface.remote_interface_ref
  INNER JOIN meta_device AS remote_device ON remote_device.ref = remote_iface.device_ref
WHERE
  src_as_id IN (401015, 14031) OR dst_as_id IN (401015, 14031)
GROUP BY src_node, dst_node

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(start_time) AS time,
  sum(bit_count)/$__interval_s as Traffic
FROM
  data_flow
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND src_as_id IN (14031, 401015)
  AND in_interface_edge = True
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time ASC

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(start_time) AS time,
  sum(bit_count)/$__interval_s as Traffic
FROM
  data_flow
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND dst_as_id IN (14031, 401015)
  AND in_interface_edge = True
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time ASC
